hero.title: Connect with Nearby Hosts and Find Budget-Friendly Stays on
hero.description: Trawise is a mobile travel application that connects travelers with local accommodation hosts through a location-based request system. Users can set their desired location and budget on an interactive map, create accommodation requests with specific dates and preferences, and receive responses from nearby hosts.

footer.description: Connect with nearby hosts and find budget-friendly stays on Trawise

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon to Your App Store
comingSoon.description: We're putting the finishing touches on the Trawise mobile app. Soon you'll be able to connect with nearby hosts and find budget-friendly stays right from your smartphone.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Your Account
deleteAccount.introMessage: We're sorry to see you go. You can delete your account in two ways:

viaAppSettings.title: Via App Settings
viaAppSettings.description: Go to Settings > Delete Account to remove your data instantly.

requestHere.title: Request Here or by Email
requestHere.description: If you prefer, email us and we'll process your deletion request manually.
